summary: An urgent email from Joyce L. Williams, legal administrative assistant at Akerman Senterfitt, requesting a call to Judge Davis regarding Epstein. The email is marked high importance and urgent, and contains confidentiality and tax advice disclaimers.

events.title: Urgent Call Request Regarding Epstein
events.description: Joyce L. Williams sends an urgent email requesting a call to Judge Davis regarding Epstein.

locations: Akerman Senterfitt, One Southeast Third Avenue, 25th Floor, Miami, Florida 33131-1714
keyFacts: An urgent, high-priority email was sent on November 29, 2007, regarding Epstein.
The email requests a call to Judge Edward B. Davis as soon as possible.
The correspondence originates from the law firm Akerman Senterfitt in Miami.
The email contains strict confidentiality and IRS Circular 230 tax advice disclaimers.
